name: CPP Connect
description: A platform for Imperial College Computing Students to connect with employers. Completed as part of my internship with Imperial DoC EdTech.

name: Fractal Visualiser
description: A web app for visualising Mandelbrot and Julia sets. Work-in-progress.

name: Assembly IDE
description: A terminal-based IDE for a subset of the ARM A64 assembly language. Made for my Imperial College Computing 1st Year Group Project.

name: XonT
description: Generative AI tool for creating 3d stylised assets on tiles. 2nd place for AI in gaming bounty at Encode Club AI hackathon.

name: Author Recognition
description: Extended project on using machine learning techniques for authorship attribution. Winner of Gold CREST Award.

name: Atmosphere Model
description: 2022 BPhO Computational Physics Challenge winning submission. Won top 5 gold award.

name: Cube Society
description: Site I made for my school's Rubik's Cube Society.
